{{cpp/title|make_error_code{{dsc small|(std::future_errc)}}}}
{{cpp/thread/future_errc/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header | future}}
{{dcl | since=c++11 |
std::error_code make_error_code( std::future_errc e );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Constructs an {{lc|std::error_code}} object from a value of type {{lc|std::future_errc}} as if by: 

{{cc|std::error_code(static_cast&lt;int&gt;(e), std::future_category())}}. 

This function is called by the constructor of {{lc|std::error_code}} when given an {{lc|std::future_errc}} argument.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | e | error code number}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
A value of type {{lc|std::error_code}} that holds the error code number from {{tt|e}} associated with the error category {{c|"future"}}.

===Example===
{{example
 | 
 | code=
 | output=
}}
